channel.title: Muscle and Motion
channel.description:
Become a Movement Professional Get an Inside View of the Anatomy & Biomechanics of Movement
We have 4 apps, choose the best for you! Acquire all the knowledge you need as a trainer/movement professional

item.description:
A new exercise we uploaded to the Strength Training app, Biceps Curl with Hip Abduction using a Resistance Band.
The target muscles are the biceps brachii and gluteus medius (colored red). The abdominals and other core muscles assist in maintaining normative curvatures. The ability to stand on one leg is important. Improving your balance can help improve sports performance.
How to do it? In a standing position, place the band under the feet and hold the other end in one hand. Bend the elbow and at the same time abduct the opposite leg.
In addition to strengthening these muscles, an equally important aim is to strengthen the core muscles and improve balance.
Muscle and Motion's apps available for any movement professional looking to take his knowledge one step forward!
For more videos, be sure to subscribe to our channel here on youtube at the link below, and don’t forget to turn on notifications so you never miss one. YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/user/MuscleandMotion

item.description:
Watch how the abdominal muscles work in motion. Learning about the anatomy of the exercises you perform helps you learn the perfect form when practicing.
Liked this video? Please give it a thumbs up and share it with your friends.
For 4000 more videos like these, visit our website: http://www.muscleandmotion.com/free-trials/ and download the free trial of Muscle & Motion - Strength Training.

Practical tests and theoretical concepts are included, as well as an interactive exercise encyclopedia! - Ideal for personal trainers & weight trainers, athletes, physical therapists, massage therapists, occupational therapists & anyone interested in the anatomy of muscles with a focus on strength training. - New videos are added regularly to the resource so you will always be up-to-date with the most advanced knowledge available! item.title: Abdominal Training Anatomy in Video Motion
item.author: Muscle and Motion

item.description:
Biceps Curl, Single Leg Deadlift Stance / Bent Over Stance.
The exercise is intended to strengthen the elbow flexors dynamically, strengthen the posterior chain statically, and improve balance.
The target muscle is the biceps brachii (red). The brachialis and brachioradialis assist in elbow flexion.
The erector spinae, transversus abdominis and the other core muscles stabilize the torso.
The posterior chain stabilizes the pelvis, spine and hip joint. A strong posterior chain is essential for building good movement patterns, solid strength and bodily support in your workout.
With thousands of exercise and 3D videos at your fingertips, the Strength Training App is available for any movement professional looking to take his knowledge one step forward!
